name: UITextSelectionRect
desc: An encapsulation of information about a selected range of text in a document.

items.name: var rect: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangle that encloses the text selection rectangle’s text range.

items.name: var writingDirection: NSWritingDirection
items.desc: The writing direction of text in the text selection rectangle’s text range.

items.name: var isVertical: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text is vertical.

items.name: var containsStart: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the rectangle contains the start of the selection.

items.name: var containsEnd: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the rectangle contains the end of the selection.
